SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdminUiPage
AdminUiPage acts as both a UiPageProvider and its factory, registering a "Service discovery" page in the Keycloak Admin UI.
CustomAdminClientRoleResource
REST resource provider for managing client roles and user profiles.
CustomAdminClientRoleResourceProviderFactory
Factory for the Custom Admin Client Role Resource Provider.
CustomAdminComponentProvider
REST resource provider for custom component updates in the Admin API.
CustomAdminComponentProviderFactory
Factory for the Custom Admin Component Provider.
DidasClientDiscoveryProvider
JAX-RS provider exposing the DID discovery document at /realms/{realm}/.well-known/did.json.
DidasClientDiscoveryProviderFactory
Factory for the Didas Client Discovery Provider.
DidasJpaRealmProvider
JPA-based RealmProvider customized to insert DID discovery metadata when creating client roles.
DidasJpaRoleProviderFactory
Factory that produces JPA-based realm providers enhanced for DID discovery roles.
DidasRoleAdapter
Adapter class that wraps a JPA RoleEntity to the Keycloak RoleModel interface, augmenting it to persist and interpret DID discovery attributes.
DidasServiceDocument
Helper to build a service document JSON fragment from a Keycloak role.
DidasUserAuthenticator
Custom authenticator for WebAuthn-based user authentication with additional vehicle-based access control.
DidasUserAuthenticatorFactory
Factory for the DidasUserAuthenticator, registering it under the ID "didas-user-authenticator" for WebAuthn-based login flows.
DidasUserProfileProvider
Implementation of UserProfileProvider that loads and caches declarative user profile metadata from JSON stored in the component configuration.
DidasUserProfileProviderFactory
Factory for the Didas user profile provider, extending DeclarativeUserProfileProviderFactory.
ThemeUiTab
ThemeUiTab integrates a custom "Service discovery" tab into the Keycloak Admin UI client-details screen and validates discovery attributes on client roles.
